ygData.subject: Re: Odd Spell out..
ygData.msgSnippet: Rangers also get Feet like cat , a shaman spell Please keep in mind that brad plays a ranger so don t be surprised if they get extra things here and there ...
ygData.messageBody:
Rangers also get Feet like cat , a shaman spell

Please keep in mind that brad plays a ranger so don't be surprised if they
get extra things here and there


-----Original Message-----
From: Wilson, ThomasX B <thomasx.b.wilson@...>
To: 'shadowknight@onelist.com' <shadowknight@onelist.com>
Date: Tuesday, October 12, 1999 11:57 AM
Subject: [shadowknight] Odd Spell out..


>From: "Wilson, ThomasX B" <thomasx.b.wilson@...>
>
>Noticed this yesterday when I was playing my Wiz.. Wizards get a 4th lvl
>Spell Glimpse, no biggie right. Well Rangers get it as well, but I didn't
>see Druids on the list.. I found this odd because as far as I know Sk's
only
>get Necro spells and Pals only get Cleric spells.. Anybody else find this
>rather strange (the spell itself sucks, I was just curious).
>
>Thom
>
